content:
I am a second year Dphil student in Computer Vision at the Department of Engineering Science working under the supervision of Prof. Philip Torr where I work closely with Dr. Puneet Dokania. I am lucky enough to be supervised by some remarkable researchers from Adobe Richard Zhang ,Eli Shechtman, Oliver Wang , Alyosha Efros.
Research The central goal of my research is to be able to generate and edit realistic images with very sparse user interaction. I am also interested in Generative Models based on Generative Adversarial Networks and Unsupervised Learning in general.
